site_name: Unit 1D, Woodstock Studios, 36 Woodstock Grove, LONDON, W12 8LE
description: This Council is asked for its observations on an application received by the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham (2021/03736/FUL) for Change of use of the first floor from commercial studio (Class E) 2 x studio and 2 x 3 bedroom self-contained flats (Class C3); external alterations to include the installation of bi-folding doors and formation of projecting balconies to replace 6no windows and installation of bi-folding doors together with the formation of a roof terrace to replace 1 window at first floor level to eastern elevation; replacement of 9 windows with new bi-folding doors and formation of 4 recessed roof terraces to south western elevation at first floor level; replacement of the existing window with bi-folding doors and the formation of a recessed roof terrace and installation of obscure glazing to fire exit door at first floor level to the northern elevation; formation of 4no enclosed bin stores at ground floor car parking are
